mapper.insert: INSERT INTO visit_log (session_id, ip_address, request_url, user_agent, referer) VALUES (#{sessionId}, #{ipAddress}, #{requestUrl}, #{userAgent}, #{referer})
mapper.select: SELECT id as id ,session_id as sessionId ,ip_address as ipAddress ,request_url as requestUrl ,user_agent as userAgent ,referer as referer ,visit_time as visitTime FROM visit_log ORDER BY visit_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
